class sparce.feature_selection(X, y, nFeatures, nJobs)

Bases: object

chiSQ_selector(y, nFeatures)
Parameters

  • X (pandas dataframe) – continuous data

  • y (encoded class data) – class data

Returns

support

Return type

list boolean

Returns

feature_list

Return type

list string

Objective: Use the chi-squared test to select features. Reference: https://scikit-learn.org/stable/modules/generated/sklearn.feature_selection.chi2.html

cross_validate_feature_selection(chiSQ_support, rfe_support, lR_support, rfC_support, rfR_support)
Parameters

  • feature_list (list string) – list of features

  • chiSQ_support (list boolean) – support

  • rfe_support (list boolean) – support

  • lR_support (list boolean) – support

  • rfC_support (list boolean) – support

  • rfR_support (list boolean) – support

Returns

dataframe quantifying the performance of each feature selection method

Return type

dataframe

Objective: Use the cross validation to select features. Reference: https://towardsdatascience.com/feature-selection-techniques-in-machine-learning-with-python-f24e7da3f36e

grade_features(y, nFeatures, n_jobs)
Parameters

  • X – continuous data :type X: pandas dataframe

  • y – class data :type y: encoded class data

  • nFeatures (int) – number of features to select

  • nJobs (int) – number of jobs to run in parallel

Objective: Call each function in the feature selection class, grade each set of features with each of the algorithms. Sum the total boolen supports for each feature and then sort the features by the sum.

Reference: https://towardsdatascience.com/feature-selection-techniques-in-machine-learning-with-python-f24e7da3f36e

variant annotation file

pandas dataframe

parse_bedfile()
Parameters

variantAnnotationFile (string) – variant annotation file

Returns

variant annotation file

Return type

pandas dataframe

format: chr start end name score strand

Objective: parse a bed file that contains variants from an organism of interest into apandas dataframe. Bin variants into a sliding window of size 100kb.
